blog.name: ao3feed-jyrus
blog.title: AO3 Feed for Jyrus Fics
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Jonah Beck/Cyrus Goodman pairing tag. Please note any fic ratings, warnings or tags before reading; because this blog is automated, all AO3 Jyrus fics are posted here without prior review from a human. Please contact me with concerns about any posting.

summary: Divided But United
title: Divided But United
body:
Read it on AO3: https://ift.tt/2HookZF

by LordCheezIt

Four newly introduced friends, Jonah Beck, Cyrus Goodman, Andi Mack, and Buffy Driscoll are attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as First-Year’s. But what happens when they are all divided into the four separate houses?

Words: 2964, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Andi Mack (TV), Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Jonah Beck, Cyrus Goodman, Andi Mack, Buffy Driscoll, T. J. Kippen, Amber (Andi Mack), Walker Brodsky, Marty (Andi Mack), Iris (Andi Mack), Kira (Andi Mack), Natalie (Andi Mack), Gus (Andi Mack), Reed (Andi Mack), Lester (Andi Mack), Kip (Andi Mack), Libby (Andi Mack), Dr. Metcalf (Andi Mack), Mr. Coleman (Andi Mack), Original Characters
  • Relationships: Jonah Beck/Cyrus Goodman, Walker Brodsky/Andi Mack, Buffy Driscoll/Marty, Amber/Iris (Andi Mack)
  • Additional Tags: Andi Mack Harry Potter AU, Alternate Universe, Fantasy World, pure fluff, Occasional angst, this story occurs after Harry Potter’s time in Hogwarts, Friendship/Love, Sorting, Hogwarts First Year, Bullying, slight homophobia, Mild Cursing, Hurt/Comfort, introductions, Diagon Alley, Quidditch

blog.name: thegoodmantj
blog.title: A Goodmess
blog.description: Andi Mack + Tyrus | Lucas, 22 He/Him  | AO3 : TheGoodmanTJ | Tøp blog : Kitchensinkwithalovelypen

summary: 5 top Andi Mack headcanon?
question: 5 top Andi Mack headcanon?
answer:
Sorry, a couple of mine are generic, and most of them involve TJ in one way or another but-

1.) I really love the Kippen Siblings. Amber is a year older than TJ, and as much as they fought, and never really got along growing up, (and still tend to not get along now) they’re always there for each other because at the end of the day they’re family. And the happiness of their family is their number one priority. They help each other through all their relationship problems and right now Amber is doing her best to help talk TJ through what happened on costume day. It’s just going to take time on both ends.

2.) TJ has some sort of artsy talent. Whether he be an amazing artist, a fantastic writer, or an astounding photographer, TJ has been keeping this talent from everyone for so long because he is afraid of opening up to anyone and letting them see his softer side. However it’s all started with Cyrus and he’s only going to be opening up more as time goes on. The walls of his bedroom(or desk, for writing) are filled with his work and the first time Cyrus enters his bedroom he’s speechless. He’s never seen such detailed work before, and it made him fall in love with TJ even more than he had originally thought possible. He gives Cyrus a piece of his work that he had been saving for this moment, he spent all his time trying to get it just right, and when he finally did, he couldn’t have been happier.

3.) Along with his artsy talent, TJ is absolutely in love with botany, and everything to do with gardening. He has one of the best green thumbs around(Some say he may even be better than Bowie or Cece. But none of them would ever admit that.) Which is why in secret, the three of them tend to get together and tend to their gardens. Cece has the garden in her front yard, Bowie did the best he could with the space he was given and dedicated an area of their front porch to buying some planters, and TJ has a huge garden in his backyard that he’s been helping his mom with ever since he was little.(Amber, while she loves flowers, was never one for the work that goes into planting, and taking care of them.) They also have various produce growing back there as well, which they always use when making meals.

4.) One day, Andi had come home abruptly during one of their secret gardening get-togethers. Needless to say she was surprised, and found it really weird when she had to ask “You’ve all been gardening together… in secret?” In turn, she gained admiration for TJ. She saw a side of him that only Cyrus had been seeing for so long. They began to form a friendship, seeing as it would probably be best for both Cyrus, and Amber. TJ helps teach her how to garden properly. She had always wanted to learn, but Cece always shooed her away because she never had the patience for it. They start small with flowers, and work their way up to planting pumpkins so that way they’ll all start being able to judge who carves the best pumpkin. Andi shows TJ how to make crafts. She starts him off small, just as he did with her, showing him how to make cranes. Eventually, when he got the hang of it, she teaches him to make bracelets. He makes matching ones for both Cyrus and himself so that way they’ll always be connected. Neither of them take off their bracelet.

5.) TJ has a surprisingly extensive knowledge about music. He has playlists from the 1970′s all the way up to today’s current hits. Although there will always be a special place in his heart for the 1980′s. Most of the time when they hangout, Cyrus tests him by seeing if he can guess songs within a couple seconds, and he manages to always get them right. That and he remembers the lyrics to almost every song he’s enjoyed growing up. Every time music is playing, he is singing. He’s not a great singer, but he does it anyways. He finds it fun to sing along wherever he is. In the shower, in the car on the way to school, belting out the notes when he’s home alone, his duets with Cyrus up in his room. It doesn’t matter where, if he knows the words, he’s going to sing.

Wait, did I say most of them involved TJ? I definitely meant all of them.

I honestly have a TJ problem, and I’m not sorry about it.

I honestly have a TJ problem, and I’m not sorry about it.

blog.name: tyrus-endgayme-confirmed
blog.title: Tyrus is winning
blog.description: Just a place where I can scream my love for Tyrus as loud as I can

tags: ok let's be real here . . .  that b- though?
like he did when he got that c
summary:
TJ, bursting into the room: Buffy! The greatest thing just happened to me! You won't even believe it!
Buffy: Yeah yeah, I've...
body:
TJ, bursting into the room: Buffy! The greatest thing just happened to me! You won’t even believe it!

Buffy: Yeah yeah, I’ve already know about you shooting the winning basket at the game today, TJ. It’s all your Coach was talking about when I greeted him afterwards.

TJ: Huh? Oh right, the game. Yeah, that was fun. But that’s not what I’m talking about here.

Buffy: Is this about you getting your very first B- on a math test? Cyrus told me about that.

TJ: Oh yeah, that happened. Completely forgot about that. But no, this is something else.

Buffy: You’re not still bragging about that hundred dollar bill you find on the street yesterday, are you??

TJ: Oh, that? Please. That is nothing compared to what happened just now.

Buffy: Well, what happened then??

TJ: Okay, brace yourself cuz I guarantee this will shake you to your very core …

TJ: Cyrus. Held. My hand.

TJ: *waves his hands wildly around his head and makes explosion noises*

Buffy:

Buffy: You’ve got to be kidding me.

TJ: No, I’m serious! This really happened! We’re not even talking a little pinkie touch or grab of the wrist here–this was a FULL ON handhold! Like, I thought he was just gonna give me a simple high-five or something, and the next thing I know he’s casually interwining our fingers! Wait, lemme reenact the whole thing for you–

Buffy, already out the door: Nah, I’m good.

TJ: No, I’m serious! This really happened! We’re not even talking a little pinkie touch or grab of the wrist here–this was a FULL ON handhold! Like, I thought he was just gonna give me a simple high-five or something, and the next thing I know he’s casually interwining our fingers! Wait, lemme reenact the whole thing for you–

Buffy, already out the door: Nah, I’m good.

trail.content_raw:
TJ, bursting into the room: Buffy! The greatest thing just happened to me! You won’t even believe it!

Buffy: Yeah yeah, I’ve already know about you shooting the winning basket at the game today, TJ. It’s all your Coach was talking about when I greeted him afterwards.

TJ: Huh? Oh right, the game. Yeah, that was fun. But that’s not what I’m talking about here.

Buffy: Is this about you getting your very first B- on a math test? Cyrus told me about that.

TJ: Oh yeah, that happened. Completely forgot about that. But no, this is something else.

Buffy: You’re not still bragging about that hundred dollar bill you find on the street yesterday, are you??

TJ: Oh, that? Please. That is nothing compared to what happened just now.

Buffy: Well, what happened then??

TJ: Okay, brace yourself cuz I guarantee this will shake you to your very core …

TJ: Cyrus. Held. My hand.

TJ: *waves his hands wildly around his head and makes explosion noises*

Buffy:

Buffy: You’ve got to be kidding me.

TJ: No, I’m serious! This really happened! We’re not even talking a little pinkie touch or grab of the wrist here–this was a FULL ON handhold! Like, I thought he was just gonna give me a simple high-five or something, and the next thing I know he’s casually interwining our fingers! Wait, lemme reenact the whole thing for you–

Buffy, already out the door: Nah, I’m good.
trail.content:
TJ, bursting into the room: Buffy! The greatest thing just happened to me! You won’t even believe it!

Buffy: Yeah yeah, I’ve already know about you shooting the winning basket at the game today, TJ. It’s all your Coach was talking about when I greeted him afterwards.

TJ: Huh? Oh right, the game. Yeah, that was fun. But that’s not what I’m talking about here.

Buffy: Is this about you getting your very first B- on a math test? Cyrus told me about that.

TJ: Oh yeah, that happened. Completely forgot about that. But no, this is something else.

Buffy: You’re not still bragging about that hundred dollar bill you find on the street yesterday, are you??

TJ: Oh, that? Please. That is nothing compared to what happened just now.

Buffy: Well, what happened then??

TJ: Okay, brace yourself cuz I guarantee this will shake you to your very core …

TJ: Cyrus. Held. My hand.

TJ: *waves his hands wildly around his head and makes explosion noises*

Buffy:

Buffy: You’ve got to be kidding me.

TJ: No, I’m serious! This really happened! We’re not even talking a little pinkie touch or grab of the wrist here–this was a FULL ON handhold! Like, I thought he was just gonna give me a simple high-five or something, and the next thing I know he’s casually interwining our fingers! Wait, lemme reenact the whole thing for you–

Buffy, already out the door: Nah, I’m good.

summary: The Notes We Write - Chapter 5
title: The Notes We Write - Chapter 5
body:
By @cyrusgoodboye, art by me!

“Underdog, you’re not invisible,” T.J. replied with a shake of his head, a smile Cyrus only ever managed to extract from him lighting up his face.  “At least, not to me.”

His words made something unfurl in Cyrus’s chest, like a block of ice thawing in his heart, and he returned T.J.’s beam.  “Thanks.”

Chapter 1 / Chapter 5

If you havent noticed, we post every Saturday!:)

summary: This question has been burning in my mind for literally so long. Why do people go so crazy for Asher and even Luke, but no one...
question: This question has been burning in my mind for literally so long. Why do people go so crazy for Asher and even Luke, but no one ever talks about how cute and amazing and special and date-able Josh is? Because seriously, I would date the heck out of that boy.
answer: I’d first like to appreciate the fact you asked someone who is under legal age, so I’m not an adult answering a question like this. Second of all my boyfriend would probably be mad if I answered this (I’m Bisexual) but yeah?? Even ust as a friend like Josh seems the most smart like aparently Asher is cute, and like even lesbians want Luke’s jawline to cut them, but like I wouldn’t date any of them, but they are like all so nice and I’d platonically protect them with all my heart!

summary: Do you have anymore TJ gay pride flag icons?
question: Do you have anymore TJ gay pride flag icons?
answer:
Hope these are good enough, anon! If you would like them in pastel, let me know and I will fix it!

If there is a pattern, color, or flag anyone wants, let me know and I will make an edit!

I am also taking requests, so if you have an icon you want, leave a request with the character, episode, and background pattern/color in my ask!
